title.rendered: FIFA WORLD CUP 2022: All Groups details and Schedule of Matches

content.rendered:
The FIFA event can in the end get modern-day in Qatar on Sunday. The event goes to be staged from Nov 20- December 18 and in the event, opener hosts Qatar might pass up towards a South American nation. Carl Jung unusual fellow of BTS is slated to carry out the distance ceremony. an entire 64 feet is going to be content material for the event.

For this Qatar event, the opportunity for the website hosting the event has been met with extreme complaints. Due to this fact, the United States of America has round-confronted corruption and legal allegations.

However, the primary goal is presently at the event and the manner it`s contended in the months of November and December.

 In India, the event goes to be broadcast on the Sports18 channel, while the streaming goes to be available on the JioCinema app.

The structures of all the Groups:

Group A: Qatar, Ecuador, Senegal, Netherlands

Group B: England, Iran, USA, Wales

Group C: Argentina, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Mexico, Poland

Group D: France, Australia, Denmark, Tunisia

Group E: Kingdom of Spain, Costa Rica, Germany, Japan

Group F: Belgium, Canada, Morocco, Croatia

Group G: Brazil, Serbia, Suisse, Cameroon

Group H: Portugal, Ghana, Uruguay, South Korea

The full cluster Stage schedule:

Sunday, Nov 20

Group A: Qatar vs Ecuador (Al Bayt Stadium, 9:30 PM IST)

Monday, Nov 21

Group B: England vs Islamic Republic of Iran (Khalifa International Stadium, 6:30 PM IST)

Group A: The Republic of Senegal vs Netherlands (Al Thumama Stadium, 9:30 PM IST)

Group B: USA vs Wales (Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Tuesday, Nov 22

Group C: Argentina vs Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Lusail painting Stadium, 3:0 PM IST)

Group D: Kingdom of Denmark vs (Education town Stadium, 6:30 PM IST)

Group C: Mexico vs Poland (Stadium 974, 9:30 PM IST)

Group D: France vs Australia (Al Janoub Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Wednesday, Nov 23

Group F: Morocco vs Croatia (Al Bayt Stadium, 3:30 PM IST)

Group E: Deutschland vs Japan (Khalifa International Stadium, 6:30 PM IST)

Group E: Kingdom of Spain vs Costa Rica (Al Thumama Stadium, 9:30 PM IST)

Group F: Belgium vs Canada (Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Thursday, Nov 24

Group G: Switzerland vs Cameroon (Al Janoub Stadium, 3:30 PM IST)

Group H: Uruguay vs South Korea (Education town Stadium, 6:30 PM IST)

Group H: Portugal vs Republic of Ghana (Stadium 974, 9:30 PM IST)

Group G: Brazil vs Serbia (Lusail painting Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Friday, Nov 25

Group B: Wales vs Islamic Republic of Iran (Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, 3:30 PM IST)

Group A: Qatar vs Republic of Senegal (Al Thumama Stadium, 6:30 PM IST)

Group A: Netherlands vs Ecuador (Khalifa International Stadium, 9:30 PM IST)

Group B: England vs USA (Al Bayt Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Saturday, Nov 26

Group C: Tunisia vs Australia (Al Janoub Stadium, 3:30 PM IST)

Group C: Poland vs Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Education town Stadium, 6:30 PM IST)

Group D: France vs Kingdom of Denmark (Stadium 974, 9:30 PM IST)

Group C: Argentina vs Mexico (Lusail painting Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Sunday, Nov 27

Group E: Japan vs Costa Rica (Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, 3:30 PM IST)

Group F: Belgium vs Morocco (Al Thumama Stadium, 6:30 PM IST)

Group F: Croatia vs Canada (Khalifa International Stadium, 9:30 PM IST)

Group E: Kingdom of Spain vs Germany (Al Bayt Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Monday, Nov 28

Group G: Cameroon vs Serbia (Al Janoub Stadium, 3:30 PM IST)

Group G: South Korea vs Republic of Ghana (Education town Stadium, 6:30 PM IST)

Group H: Brazil vs Switzerland (Stadium 974, 9:30 PM IST)

Group H: Portugal vs Uruguay (Lusail painting Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Tuesday, Nov 29

Group A: Netherlands vs Qatar (Al Bayt Stadium, 8:30 PM IST)

Group A: Ecuador vs Republic of Senegal (Khalifa International Stadium, 8:30 PM IST)

Group B: Wales vs England (Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Group B: the Islamic Republic of Iran vs USA (Al Thumama Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Wednesday, Nov 30

Group D: Australia vs Kingdom of Denmark (Al Janoub Stadium, 8:30 PM IST)

Group D: Tunisia vs France (Education town Stadium, 8:30 PM IST)

Group C: Poland vs Argentina (Stadium 974, 12:30 AM IST)

Group C: Kingdom of Saudi Arabia vs Mexico (Lusail painting Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Thursday, December 1

Group F: Croatia vs Belgium (Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, 8:30 AM IST)

Group F: Canada vs Morocco (Al Thumama Stadium, 8:30 PM IST)

Group E: Costa Rica vs Germany (Al Bayt Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Group E: Japan vs Kingdom of Spain (Khalifa International Stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

Friday, December 2

Group G: South Korea vs Portugal (Education town Stadium, 8:30 PM IST)

Group G: Republic of Ghana vs Uruguay (Al Janoub stadium, 8:30 PM IST)

Group H: Serbia vs Switzerland (Stadium 974, 12:30 AM IST)

Group H: Cameroon vs Brazil (Lusail iconic stadium, 12:30 AM IST)

The spherical of sixteen can begin on December 3 and it’ll conclude on December 6.

Then the quarter-finals are going to be content on the 9 and 10th of December. The semi-finals can be on the 14th and 15th (IST).

The final of the tournament is going to contend on the 18th Dec at 8:30 PM IST at Lusail Stadium.

Before that, the third-fourth-place contest match can act on December 17th.
